dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Welcome to the game. What is your name?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: Ah, a brave adventurer! My name is Grimbold and I've been guarding this castle for 20 years.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I am Eryndor Thorne. What brings you to this land?

dialogues.speaker: Grimbold
dialogues.text: The king has summoned me to investigate strange occurrences in the nearby village. Would you like to join me?
